thread.title: at President Trump live on stage
thread.title_full: SEE IT: Kimmel tweets at President Trump live on Oscars stage - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: at President Trump live on stage
text:
Jimmy Kimmel’s presidential provocation has gone unanswered — so far.
The Oscars host pulled out his phone onstage Sunday to query the commander-in-chief’s uncharacteristic silence on Hollywood’s biggest night.
“We’re more than two hours into the show and Donald Trump hasn’t tweeted us once,” Kimmel said. “I’m starting to get worried about him.”
Kimmel speaks at the Oscars. (MARK RALSTON/AFP/Getty Images) 
His phone screen projected onto a screen behind him, the comedian sent out two tweets: “Hey @realDonaldTrump u up?” and “@realDonaldTrump #Merylsayshi.”
Both tweets went viral within minutes, respectively receiving 188,000 and 154,000 retweets as of this writing.
President Donald Trump pauses while speaking at the Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC) on Friday. (Evan Vucci/AP) 
The President, who has spent previous years bashing the ceremony as “a sad joke” and “bulls--t” on Twitter, did not immediately reply. He and First Lady Melania Trump were hosting the glitzy Governors Ball on Sunday night.
“@realDonaldTrump is busy meeting w/governors of the nation,” Trump campaign surrogate Katrina Pierson tweeted. “You know, people that actually get things done, not just pretend to in costume.”
